snippet: Lawrence W. Becker, former headmaster of the Brooks School in Massachusetts, had an “objectionable” relationship with a student and hired a male escort while traveling on school business, officials said.
abstract: Brooks School, college-preparatory high school in North Andover, Mass, sends letter to parents and alumni revealing that former headmaster Lawrence W Becker had an 'objectionable, manipulative' relationship with a student years ago, and also hired a male escort while traveling on school business.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence W. Becker, former headmaster of the Brooks School in Massachusetts, had an “objectionable” relationship with a student and hired a male escort while traveling on school business, officials said.

headline.seo: Brooks School Reveals Misconduct by Ex-Headmaster
headline.main: Prep School Reveals Misconduct by Ex-Chief
headline.print_headline: Prep School Reveals Misconduct By Ex-Chief
